snippet: Gennady Zyuganov, the Communist Party chief, led some 1,000 followers to the grave of the Soviet dictator Josef Stalin, praising him as a symbol of the nation’s “great victories.”
lead_paragraph: Gennady Zyuganov, the Communist Party chief, led some 1,000 followers to the grave of the Soviet dictator Josef Stalin, praising him as a symbol of the nation’s “great victories.”

headline.seo: Russian Communists Pay Tribute to Stalin
